instruction: How did the integration of UAV and Sentinel-2B data improve the accuracy of estimating soil comprehensive attributes in the related study?
Output: The integration of UAV and Sentinel-2B data improved the accuracy of estimating soil comprehensive attributes in the related study by using a machine learning algorithm (random forest) to estimate soil attributes. By combining these two types of data, the model was able to capture a more comprehensive representation of the soil properties. This integration resulted in a higher accuracy of estimating the latent soil variables compared to using either data source alone.
